QuestData.Title: The Great Salvation
QuestData.Description: We've located the prisoners. They are being held in captivity here, inside the Shadowmoon fortress.$B$BPlease rescue as many of them as you can. And hurry. We can hear their screams out here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free $1oa Draenei Prisoners from their cages.
QuestData.CompletionText: You bring hope and salvation to us all, champion.
QuestData.RewardText: We are taking care of the survivors now. We owe their lives to you. Thank you, $n.
